title: "Five experimentations in computer vision: seeing (through) images from Large Scale Vision Datasets"
excerpt: "Using images from large-scale vision datasets (LSVDs), five practice-based studies – experimentations – were carried out to shed light on the visual content, replications of historical continuities, and precarious human labour behind computer vision."
